name: AwesomeFoundationFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Awesome Foundation is a global grant-making organization where individual chapters each make one-time, no-strings attached, $1,000 grants to projects that they think are Awesome. Collectively, our 90 chapters have funded over $3.5 million in projects over the past decade.

Add this skill to your flash briefings and learn about projects as they get funded around the world.

Learn more at https://www.awesomefoundation.org
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
